New Records: England won the match by 6 wickets (with 4 balls remaining)
Key Match Events: Luke Wood took 3 wickets for 24 runs
Usman Qadir took 2 wickets for 36 runs
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan: 50 runs in 5.6 overs (36 balls), Extras 0
England: 50 runs in 6.1 overs (37 balls), Extras 6
Post-Match Reflections: Luke Wood was awarded the Player of the Match award
Miscellaneous Highlights: Shan Masood and Luke Wood made their T20I debuts
The match was played on September 20, 2022, at the National Stadium, Karachi
